data.eml:eml: A review of Ophthalmitis Fletcher, 1979 in China, with descriptions of four new species (Lepidoptera: Geometridae, Ennominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiang, Nan, Xue, Dayong, Han, Hongxiang (2011): A review of Ophthalmitis Fletcher, 1979 in China, with descriptions of four new species (Lepidoptera: Geometridae, Ennominae). Zootaxa 2735: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201656
